title: Ticket #5929: Have longer default for minimum node status file update time
description:
Right now, by default, any node status file specified for a DAG gets updated every time we go through a submit cycle (assuming something has changed). I'm thinking that the default for this should be longer, like 60 seconds, so we reduce the amount of time we might spend writing the node status file for a DAG with lots of nodes.

Hmm -- I'm thinking that we should probably add a node status file to the DAG in the really large DAG test...
check_ins: 2016-Sep-30 12:24   Check-in [49356]: Gittrac #5929: Changed default node status file update time to 60 seconds; added node status file to really large DAG test; updated documentation. (By Kent Wenger )
